https://tmrev.io/movie/947022-Artists of the 20th Century: Jackson Pollock 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Born in Wyoming in 1912, Jackson Pollock became one of the most notorious artists that America ever produced. He developed a technique in which he would fix his canvas to the floor, drip and splash paint onto it, then use a variety of objects to manipulate the paint. With these innovative paintings, he became the front-runner of the Abstract Expressionist movement. Artists of the 20th Century: Jackson Pollock
